summary: This Dockerfile uses x11docker/xserver as the base image and sets up a development server. It may be used with docker-compose.

details.comment: This Dockerfile uses x11docker/xserver as the base image and sets up a development server. It may be used with docker-compose.
details.content:
# FROM ubuntu:22.04
# ref: https://gitlab.com/mviereck/x11docker#docker-desktop-or-docker-engine
FROM x11docker/xserver:latest
